author: filmaj
msg: Fixed small contacts and accelerometer object instantiation bugs. Added a bit more delay to PhoneGap constructor, 1ms caused issues sometimes I *think*.

author: filmaj
msg: Fixed building of phonegap.js in build script. Fixed GPS on Android 2.0+ - I guess they updated the version of WebKit being used on Android (similar now to how it works on iPhone) and thus the browser has a native navigator.geolocation object. Employed Jesse`s approach to proxying an object`s method since we can`t directly overwrite it.

author: filmaj
msg: Added JS concatenation and copy over to assets/www to build script.

author: filmaj
msg: Updated build file after mergin in thorstens changes.
